japanese: ん？　一花か？
translation: Hmm? Is that Ichika?

japanese: やばっ！？
translation: Oh no?!

japanese:
えっ？
おい、なんで逃げるんだよ！？
translation:
Huh?
Hey, why are you running away?!

japanese:
一花、大丈夫。
いまのはフータローだよ。
translation:
Ichika, it's okay.
That was Futaro.

japanese: えっ？　そうだったの？
translation: Eh? Was it really?

japanese: ほら。
translation: Look.

japanese:
あっ、ホントだ。
急に声をかけられてビックリしちゃったよ。
translation:
Oh, it IS Futaro-kun.
I got startled when you suddenly called out to me.

japanese:
驚いたのはこっちだ。
いきなり逃げ出しやがって、何事かと思ったぞ。
translation:
I was the one who was surprised.
You suddenly ran away,
and I thought something had happened.

japanese: ごめんごめん、ちょっとね。
translation: Sorry, sorry, it was just a little bit of a fuss before.

japanese: なんだ、なにかあったのか？
translation: What's wrong, did something happen?

japanese: いやぁ、さっきちょっと騒がれちゃって。
translation: Oh, earlier I caused a little commotion.

japanese: 女優だって、周りの人が気付いちゃったんだ。
translation: The people around us noticed that she's an actress.

japanese:
ああ、なるほど。
それで声をかけられないように
眼鏡で変装してるのか。
translation:
Ahh, I get it.
You're disguising yourself with glasses
so that you won't be recognized and approached.

japanese:
そうそう。
君、よく私だってわかったね。
translation:
Yeah, that's right.
You recognized me right away though, right?

japanese:
さすがにこれだけの付き合いがあればわかるだろ。
それに、お前の眼鏡姿は前にも見たし。
translation:
Well, with this much experience,
I should be able to.
Besides, I've seen you wearing glasses before.

japanese:
確か、出演した映画がテレビに取り上げられて、
ちょっとばかし有名になった頃だったな。
translation:
Right, it was around the time
your movie was featured on TV,
and you tasted a little fame.

japanese: ふ～ん、覚えててくれたんだ。
translation: Hmm, so you remember that.

japanese: どうせなら髪型も変えたほうがいいんじゃないか？
translation: Why don't you change your hairstyle while you're at it?

japanese:
いやいや、さすがに髪型までは変えられないよ。
いまはウィッグ持ってないし。
translation:
Well, no, I can't change my hairstyle to that extent.
I don't have a wig with me now.

japanese:
こういう時は、
髪型で印象を変えられちゃう三玖が羨ましいな。
translation:
At times like this,
I envy you, Miku. You can change your look
with just your hairstyle.

japanese: そうかな？
translation: Is that so?

japanese: ん？
translation: Hm?

japanese:
フータローは、
髪型変えても反応してくれなかった。
translation:
You didn't even react when I changed my hairstyle,
Futaro.

japanese: は？　それっていつの話だ？
translation: Huh? When was that?

japanese:
……一花の眼鏡のことは覚えてるのに、
私のことは覚えてないんだ。
translation:
...You remember Ichika's glasses,
but you don't remember my hair.

japanese:
もしかして、爺さんの温泉宿に泊まった時か？
あの時は確か五月の――
translation:
Was it when we stayed at your grandfather's
hot spring inn?
I think it was Itsuki that you%p-2;――

japanese:
全然違う。
あれは変装。
translation:
You're completely wrong.
That was a disguise.

japanese:
あっ、あれか！
学園祭の時、確か後ろでまとめてたよな。
translation:
Th-that's right!
At the school festival,
you were working behind the scenes, right?

japanese: ……違うんだな。
translation: ...Wrong again.

japanese:
そもそも、お前たちの髪型とか
見分ける時以外は気にしてなかったからな。
translation:
Actually, I only ever paid attention to your hairstyles 
when I was trying to tell you apart.

japanese:
ちょっとフータロー君？
さすがにそれはダメだよ。
女の子が髪型を変えたら、とりあえず褒めなきゃ。
translation:
Hey, Futaro-kun? That's actually not a good thing.
When a girl changes her hairstyle,
you have to praise her, at least.

japanese:
……ん？
それ、前にも言われたような。
translation:
...Hm?
I feel like I've been told that before.

japanese: 確かあれは……。
translation: I think that was...

japanese:
ああ、思い出した。
お前らと花火大会に行った時だ。
三玖が髪型を変えて、一花と間違えられたよな？
translation:
Oh, I remember now. It was when I went to the fireworks
festival with you guys. Miku, you changed your hair,
and someone else mistook you for Ichika, right?

japanese: やっと思い出したんだ。
translation: You finally remembered.

japanese: 三玖のあの髪型、結構可愛かったよね。
translation: Miku, that hairstyle on you was really cute, wasn't it?

japanese:
あの時は本当にゴタゴタしてたしな……。
どんな髪型だったか、記憶が……。
translation:
Things were so chaotic at the time...
I can't remember what kind of hairstyle it was...

japanese: むぅ……。
translation: Mmmh...

japanese:
フータロー君？
お姉さんの話、ちゃんと聞いてたのかな？
translation:
Futaro-kun?
Were you actually listening to what I was just saying?

japanese:
そんなこと言われても、
覚えてないものは仕方がないだろ。
translation:
Well, if I don't remember,
there's nothing I can do about it.

japanese:
じゃあ、ちょっと試してみよう。
三玖、ジッとしててくれる？
translation:
Then, let's try something.
Miku, could you hold still for a moment?

japanese: えっ？　ちょっと、一花？
translation: Huh? Wha... Ichika?

japanese:
よしよし、こんなものかな。
ついでにこれも貸してあげよう。
translation:
Okay, okay, this should do it.
And I'll lend you this, too.

japanese:
はい、できあがり！
結構、印象変わったんじゃない？
translation:
Here you go, it's done!
I think you've changed your appearance quite a bit.

japanese:
自分ではよくわからないけど。
フータロー、どうかな？
translation:
I'm not too sure of myself.
Futaro, what do you think?

japanese: どうって言われても。
translation: Don't ask me.

japanese: まあ、普段の三玖とは違うかな。
translation: Well, I guess it's different from the usual Miku.

japanese: えっ？　それだけ？
translation: What? Is that it?

japanese: フータローだし、そんなものだよね。
translation: Well, it is Futaro, so that's how it is.

japanese: ちょっと期待してたのに。
translation: I was expecting a little more, though.

japanese: まあ、似合うんじゃないか？
translation: Hmm, it suits you, doesn't it?

japanese: なんで疑問形……。
translation: Why are you asking in a questioning tone...

japanese: もしかしてそれ、褒めてるつもり？
translation: Are you trying to compliment her with that?

japanese: 一応そのつもりなんだが。
translation: Well, that was my intention.

japanese: もうちょっと別の言い方があると思う。
translation: There could be a better way to put it, I think.

japanese:
フータロー君的には頑張ったのかもしれないけど、
それじゃ大甘に採点して５０点。
translation:
Futaro-kun, you might have tried your best,
but that's only worth a measly 50 percent score.

japanese: 厳しいな……。
translation: Harsh...

japanese: もういい、元に戻すね。
translation: Alright, let's just go back to the way it was.

japanese:
まあ、フータロー君だしね。
こんなものかな。
translation:
Well, it's Futaro-kun after all.
I guess this is how it is.

japanese:
似合ってないわけじゃないが……
俺はいつもの三玖がいいな。
translation:
It's not like it doesn't suit her, but...
I prefer the usual Miku.

japanese: えっ？
translation: Huh?

japanese:
おお？
フータロー君にしてははっきり言ったね。
translation:
Ohh?
Futaro-kun is straightforward with his words, for once.

japanese: い、いや、普通にそう思っただけなんだが。
translation: W-well, I just thought that way.

japanese:
あっ、そうか！
髪型を変えたら、とりあえず褒めるんだったか！？
translation:
Ah, that's right!
If you change your hairstyle,
I've gotta praise it, right?!

japanese:
ううん。
別に無理して褒めてくれなくてもいい。
translation:
Nah.
You don't have to force yourself to compliment me.

japanese: そうなのか？
translation: Is that so?

japanese:
フータローが、
いつものほうがいいって言ってくれたから。
それで充分。
translation:
Futaro says that he prefers the usual Miku.
That's enough for me.

japanese:
もう元に戻すね。
一花、これありがと。
translation:
Let's just go back to the way it was.
Thank you, Ichika.

japanese: やっぱり、いつもの髪型が一番落ち着く。
translation: After all, my usual hairstyle is the most comfortable.

japanese:
まあ、こっちとしても見慣れてるほうが
安心できるかもな。
translation:
Hey, I guess I feel more at ease
seeing the familiar look too.

japanese:
フータロー君って、
良く言えば外見にはこだわらないタイプなんだね。
translation:
Futaro-kun is the type who,
speaking positively,
doesn't care much about appearances, huh.

japanese:
特にこだわる理由もない。
強いて言うとしたら、
だらしないのは勘弁してほしいくらいか。
translation:
There's no particular reason to care.
If I had to say, I'd just prefer you not to be sloppy.

japanese: だって。
translation: Is what he says.

japanese:
えー？
誰のことなのかなぁ？
translation:
Huh?
I wonder who he could be referring to?

japanese: そうか、身近にもそういうタイプがいたな。
translation: That's right. I know someone like that real close by.

japanese: もー、ひどい。
translation: Wow, you're horrible.

japanese:
でもね、恋をすれば、
そういうところも可愛く思えてくるものだよ？
translation:
But you know, when you fall in love,
those kind of things can become cute to you.

japanese: いや、ないな。
translation: No, that's not true.

japanese: ないよね。
translation: Can't be.

japanese: あーりーまーすー。
translation: Well. It. Is.

japanese: 信じられないなら経験させてあげようか？
translation:
If you don't believe me,
shall I make you experience it?

japanese:
はっ！？
それって、どういう……。
translation:
Wha?!
What does that mean...

japanese: 一花、くっつきすぎ。
translation: Ichika, you're too close to Futaro.

japanese: その気になったら、いつでも言って？
translation: If you ever feel like it, just say so, 'kay?

japanese:
（冗談なのか本気なのか……。
　一体どっちなんだよ）
translation:
(Is she joking or being serious...
Which one is it?)
